mapper.select: SELECT d.instrumentno, e.equipmentname, e.hospitalcode, b.instrumenttypeid, b.instrumenttypename, c.instrumentconfigid, c.instrumentconfigname, a.lowlimit, a.highlimit, a.alarmtime, a.instrumentparamconfigNO as instrumentparamconfigno, a.pushtime, a.warningtime, a.calibration, e.alwayalarm, e.equipmentno, ifnull( a.warningphone, '0' ) warningphone FROM instrumentparamconfig a LEFT JOIN monitorinstrumenttype b ON a.instrumenttypeid = b.instrumenttypeid LEFT JOIN instrumentconfig c ON a.instrumentconfigid = c.instrumentconfigid LEFT JOIN monitorinstrument d ON a.instrumentno = d.instrumentno LEFT JOIN monitorequipment e ON d.equipmentno = e.equipmentno where e.hospitalcode = #{hospitalCode}
